Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Smuggling? I don't know anything about that. Not sure I'd tell you if I did.
But...since I heard you're working with Artoria...you might want to speak with Zeno Faustus here in the fort. He knows things.
Probably find him at the Armory.
Smuggling? I don't know anything about that. Not sure I'd tell you if I did.
Both of my soldiers have been killed? That's impossible! You had something to do with this!
Gaea Artoria is dead? That's impossible! You had something to do with this!
Saenus Lusius is dead? That's impossible! You had something to do with this!
You've not yet uncovered the smuggling ring? You should get to work.

I've noticed the store of weapons in the armory has been decreasing, and I know there is no official reason for it. My only guess is that someone is smuggling them off Solstheim to be sold on Vvardenfell.
I want you to uncover this smuggling ring, and I will provide you with a bit of help.
That task is complete. We have other matters at hand.
The smugglers are dead, so the smuggling ring is effectively broken. Not the way I would have done it, perhaps, but effective nonetheless. Let us return to the fort.
You have made your decision. I will let you report these findings to Carius. I hope you have made the correct decision.
I believe we have enough information to break up this ring. Let us finish.
You've chosen to work with Gaea Artoria, have you not? She'll be a more than able companion for you. You should speak with her about this matter.

I suggest we speak with some of the soldiers here at the fort. A motley bunch, to be sure, but some of them are fair soldiers. I've developed quite a rapport with a few, in fact. Why don't we begin by speaking with Zeno Faustus. He's an interesting character.
We'll find him in the Armory.
Well, if you choose to work with me, I'm certain I can be of some assistance in this matter.
All taken care of.
I figure they're all dead. We better get back to Cap'n Carius.
Looks like we're in the right place. We're gonna have to take all of them out if we're going to break up the smuggling ring. Kill all of these smugglers. I like the sound of that. Let's go!
I think we've got the information we need. Let's go get these guys. All of them. And not leave any alive. That sounds like a good plan to me.
Hey, you're working with Lusius. He's a smart guy. Ask him about it.

Hmmm...well, I figure that they're taking the weapons from here, and then bringing them somewhere else. Cap'n doesn't like it. Hope that helps. Someone else must know something. Let's go crack some skulls.
Yeah, I figure if we work together, we'll find those smugglers and make them sorry. I'm good at making people sorry.
There's nothing more I can tell you about that.

I heard you're with Lusius, so I figure you must be okay. Listen up. I overheard some of the soldiers talking about a place, the Gandrung Caverns, that's a bit northeast of the fort. Something about weapons being stashed there.
I didn't want to know more than that. Maybe you should check that place out. But if you find them, you'll have to kill them...unless you can find some other arrangement.

Okay, look, here's the deal. I overheard some of the soldiers talking about a place, the Gandrung Caverns, that's a bit northeast of the fort. Something about weapons being stashed there. I didn't want to know more than that.
I didn't want to know more than that. Maybe you should check that place out. But if you find them, you'll have to kill them...unless you can find some other arrangement.
I'm not sure I should talk about that. I don't know you, and even though I heard you were working with Artoria, she doesn't scare me a bit.

Smuggling? Well, if you're with Lusius, I guess I can tell you what I've heard. Check out the Gandrung Caverns, a bit northeast of the fort. I've heard a couple of the soldiers talk about the place. They mentioned weapons that were stashed there.
Look, you didn't hear it from me, though. I'll deny it.
Why should I talk to you? Find someone else to bother.
I heard that business was taken care of.
Don't ask me. You might want to ask Zeno Faustus about it. He knows what goes on around here. You might find him in the Armory here at the fort.

Smuggling? I don't know anything about that. Not sure I'd tell you if I did. But...since I heard you're working with Artoria...you might want to speak with Zeno Faustus here in the fort. He knows things. Probably find him at the Armory.
Smuggling? I don't know anything about that. Not sure I'd tell you if I did.
